languages.text: "Эвейн... Эвейн..." {n}— бормочет Абеляр под нос, поглаживая бороду.{/n} "Один из дальних младших отпрысков, да. Больше про него ничего не знаю — значит, не отличился ничем".

traits.locale_text: "Эвейн... Эвейн..." {n}— бормочет Абеляр под нос, поглаживая бороду.{/n} "Один из дальних младших отпрысков, да. Больше про него ничего не знаю — значит, не отличился ничем".

languages.text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."
languages.original_text: "Эвейн... Эвейн..." {n}— бормочет Абеляр под нос, поглаживая бороду.{/n} "Один из дальних младших отпрысков, да. Больше про него ничего не знаю — значит, не отличился ничем".

languages.text: «Sí... Evayne...». {n} Murmura Abelard, peinándose la barba.{/n} «Uno de sus descendientes más jóvenes y distantes. Eso es todo lo que sé sobre él, es decir, que no ha destacado por nada en particular».
languages.original_text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."

traits.locale_text: «Sí... Evayne...». {n} Murmura Abelard, peinándose la barba.{/n} «Uno de sus descendientes más jóvenes y distantes. Eso es todo lo que sé sobre él, es decir, que no ha destacado por nada en particular».

languages.text: "Evayne ... Evayne ..."{n}, murmelt Abelard und streicht sich dabei den Bart.{/n} "Einer seiner entfernten jüngeren Schösslinge, ja. Mehr weiß ich nicht über ihn, was bedeutet, dass er sich nicht groß hervorgetan hat."
languages.original_text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."

traits.locale_text: "Evayne ... Evayne ..."{n}, murmelt Abelard und streicht sich dabei den Bart.{/n} "Einer seiner entfernten jüngeren Schösslinge, ja. Mehr weiß ich nicht über ihn, was bedeutet, dass er sich nicht groß hervorgetan hat."

languages.text: « Evayne... Evayne... {n}Abélard marmonne en se caressant la barbe.{/n} L'un de ses plus jeunes descendants, oui. C'est tout ce que je sais à son sujet, ce qui veut dire qu'il ne s'est guère illustré jusqu'à présent. »
languages.original_text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."

traits.locale_text: « Evayne... Evayne... {n}Abélard marmonne en se caressant la barbe.{/n} L'un de ses plus jeunes descendants, oui. C'est tout ce que je sais à son sujet, ce qui veut dire qu'il ne s'est guère illustré jusqu'à présent. »

languages.text: “艾维尼……艾维尼……”{n}阿贝拉德摸着胡子，喃喃自语。{/n}“没错，确实是他的子嗣，但除此之外我就不清楚了，这说明他没有什么过人之处。”
languages.original_text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."

traits.locale_text: “艾维尼……艾维尼……”{n}阿贝拉德摸着胡子，喃喃自语。{/n}“没错，确实是他的子嗣，但除此之外我就不清楚了，这说明他没有什么过人之处。”

languages.text: 「エヴァイン…エヴァイン…」{n}アベラルドは髭を撫でながら呟く。{/n}「彼の遠い子孫の一人、ですね。我が知っている事はこれくらいです。つまり、彼は何ら目立った活躍をしていないということです」
languages.original_text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."

traits.locale_text: 「エヴァイン…エヴァイン…」{n}アベラルドは髭を撫でながら呟く。{/n}「遠縁の若いご子孫のひとり、ですね。彼について知っている事はこれくらいです。つまり、価値のある方法で名を上げていないということですね」
「エヴァイン…エヴァイン…」{n}アベラルドは髭を撫でながら呟く。{/n}「彼の遠い子孫の一人、ですね。我が知っている事はこれくらいです。つまり、彼は何ら目立った活躍をしていないということです」

languages.text: "Evayne... Evayne." {n}Abelard, sakalını sıvazlayarak mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Genç oğullarından öyle biri vardı, doğru. Yalnız, adını sanını pek duymamış olmam, kendisini öne çıkaramamış olduğuna delalet."
languages.original_text: "Evayne... Evayne..." {n}Abelard mutters, stroking his beard.{/n} "One of his distant younger offspring, yes. That's as much as I know about him, which means he hasn't distinguished himself in any meaningful way."

traits.locale_text: "Evayne... Evayne," {n}diye sakalını sıvazlayarak mırıldanıyor Abelard.{/n} "Genç oğullarından öyle biri vardı, doğru. Yalnız, adını sanını pek duymamış olmam, kendisini öne çıkaramamış olduğuna delalet."
